content.question: The trends for China and India in Graph 2 are best understood in the context of the

choices.label: regional economic impact of the Great Leap Forward on industrial production
breakup of European colonial empires in the aftermath of the Second World War
shift of industrial production toward Asia beginning in the late twentieth century
efforts of international financial organizations to encourage greater cooperation among countries

content.answer: shift of industrial production toward Asia beginning in the late twentieth century

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
